# streamingEar()

**Type Method**

Returns which ears enable streaming.

## Declaration

```swift
static func streamingEar() -> AXMFiHearingDevice.Ear
```

## Return Value

An [doc://com.apple.Accessibility/documentation/Accessibility/AXMFiHearingDevice/Ear] constant that represents which ears enable streaming.

## Streaming status

- **AXMFiHearingDevice.Ear**: Constants that represent a hearing device ear.
- **streamingEarDidChangeNotification**: A notification that the system posts when there’s a change to which ears enable streaming.
